metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34300 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In tinyexr 1.0.1, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in tinyexr::DecodePixelData.

notes.Note: alexmurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap no indication that chromium-browser is vulnerable to this issue

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
